content.description: This boulder is sick and a complete power and core problem with techy balance and finesse, there are three crux's, first you go all the way back in the cave and sit on a obvious sit start rock with jugs in your face pull a couple fun moves to a big jug sloper and do a three foot drop down to another sloper (first crux) at that point you should be horizontal and both hands on lower sloper rail then the fun begins do some super core moves to the middle of the rail and be delicate here this is the second crux once you get you right hand on the only good hold to a big dead point to a awesome pinch then keep your core and composer and set a heel set up and do a huge four foot deadpoint to the jug(third crux) caution there is a tooth and it will bite you if you grab it wrong then bust a few fun moves on steep terrain and top it out and its over
content.protection: A couple pads and a few friends
content.location: From the black box in big bend look up the hill and you will see a lightning bolt like crack and off to the right you will see a cave and some chalk following the arete, pretty straight foward if you are lucky you will see some locals up there screaming cause its kicking their ass.

climbs.name: Black Angus Slab
climbs.fa: Think it's black slab in the black Utah book

content.description: Start the same as black Angus but turn the arete into the slab with two good side pull crimps and smearing feet then up to thin but decent slab
content.protection: couple pads and a spotter for the slab top out
content.location: Boulder found just up the hill from the chaos boulder

content.description:
An oft neglected classic.  Black Angus takes the leaning sloper ramp all the way to the top.

Start matched on a crimp rail and make your way out to the arete and up the sloping rail to the flat top out.  You'll be very high off the ground once your close to the top and the farther you go the worse your landing gets.

The sun beats down on the black varnished sloper rail so this is probably much easier when the temps are low.
content.protection: Lots of pads and a spotter once your going for it.
content.location: Up the hill and around the corner from Sloper City.
